title: AnyMP4 Bluray Creator v1.0.8 ML Incl Patch-LAXiTY [TorDigger]

Key Functions and Features:

Create DIY Blu-ray disc/movie with the easiest way

This powerful Blu-ray Burner has the ability to burn Blu-ray disc with any video file like AVCHD video, 1080P HD video, YouTube video, QuickTime video and other common videos. 
It helps you create DIY Blu-ray disc with the latest videos and it would be the first choice for creating BD disc on Windows 8 computer. 
You are able to burn video files to BD-25 and BD-50 at will, and then play the DIY Blu-ray movie on any mainstream Blu-ray Player device like Sony BDP-S5, Samsung BD-F, LG Electronics BP, PS3, and popular Blu-ray Player software.

Convert various video files to Blu-ray folder and ISO image files

With the wording leading Video to Blu-ray Converter software, you are allowed to make Blu-ray folder/ISO image files directly with any popular HD and common video file at blazing-fast speed. Thus you can backup your favorite video files on computer as the Blu-ray format. 
The supported input video formats are MTS, TS, MXF, TRP, MP4, MOV, AVI, WMV, MKV, FLV, 3GP, M4V, MPEG, RMVB, WebM, and VOB, etc.

Make your preferred Blu-ray menu style

It provides you various menu templates/frames/buttons to choose in the "Edit Menu" interface. You can also free download other more beautiful menu templates online at will if local templates are not satisfy your needs. 
You can rename for each Blu-ray title and customize text titles with font type, color, size, alignment that best suit your menu design and video content. 
Even you are able to add background music such as an audio track or dialog you've recorded to your menu templates and choose background picture for the Blu-ray menu.

Customize Blu-ray movie with multiple editing features

Add and edit your favorite subtitle/audio track
You can add your ideal audio track and subtitle for Blu-ray movie. Editing audio track for adjusting the Volume, Latency, Encoder, Bitrate and Channels, and subtitle for adjusting font, size, color, display position.
Personalize video like effect, crop, and watermark
It freely adjust video effect like brightness, contrast, saturation and hue; crop video frame to get rid of unwanted video black edges; add text and image watermark to the video and more.

Intuitive interface design and excellent acceleration technology

This Blu-ray Creator software featuring user-friendly design and intuitive interface, enables users to handle the whole creating process in the easiest way.
